description: A Flutter application's main source file that sets up the app's root widget, theme, and home page structure with a simple progress display.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter application, configuring theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, displaying a progress message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, initializing and running the root widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
